about_the_game:
"ENA! We've got work to do, so quit daydreaming and pay attention! And don't you DARE get involved in any predicaments along the way... got it?!!"

The first interactive adventure of the ENA series by Joel G.

Play as ENA as she searches for the Boss that everyone wants to be. Explore strange worlds, take on side gigs, and meet both sweet and sour characters along the journey.

There is a lot to encounter on your adventures:

  • Explore new environments filled with hidden secrets and oddities.

  • Meet different characters who only want you to do things for them.

  • Use strange Tools to solve unusual problems.

  • Live the experience of being the least popular person at any party.

Disclaimers:

  • This game contains sections with flashing lights and images that may induce seizures in individuals with photosensitive epilepsy.

  • This game contains visuals and language that some individuals may find disturbing. Viewer discretion is advised.
detailed_description:
Support the Developers

A Support the Developers version will be available for purchase at release. This will include pre-production content such as sequence animatics, unused animations, and more!


About the Game

"ENA! We've got work to do, so quit daydreaming and pay attention! And don't you DARE get involved in any predicaments along the way... got it?!!"

The first interactive adventure of the ENA series by Joel G.

Play as ENA as she searches for the Boss that everyone wants to be. Explore strange worlds, take on side gigs, and meet both sweet and sour characters along the journey.

There is a lot to encounter on your adventures:

  • Explore new environments filled with hidden secrets and oddities.

  • Meet different characters who only want you to do things for them.

  • Use strange Tools to solve unusual problems.

  • Live the experience of being the least popular person at any party.

Disclaimers:

  • This game contains sections with flashing lights and images that may induce seizures in individuals with photosensitive epilepsy.

  • This game contains visuals and language that some individuals may find disturbing. Viewer discretion is advised.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 18.04 or similar
  • Processor: 64-bit Dual Core or greater
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Vulkan capable
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 20.04 or similar
  • Processor: Intel i3-12100F | AMD Ryzen 5 3600
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1650 | RX 570
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS 10.13 (64bit)
  • Processor: Universal (Apple Silicon or Intel)
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Metal capable
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Mac OS 10.13 (64bit)
  • Processor: Universal (Apple Silicon or Intel)
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Metal capable
  • Storage: 10 GB available space

name: ENA: Dream BBQ

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 or later (64bit)
  • Processor: 64-bit Dual Core or greater
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DX11 capable
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Window 10 or Windows 11 (64bit)
  • Processor: Intel i3-12100F | AMD Ryzen 5 3600
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1650 | RX 570
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Experience surreal environments and inexplicable characters as ENA in a new wild world.
